mapper.select: select ai.auth_id, parent_id, auth_name, auth_desc, auth_grade, auth_type, auth_url, auth_code, auth_order, auth_state from auth_info ai left join role_auth ra on ai.auth_id = ra.auth_id left join user_role ur on ur.role_id = ra.role_id left join role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and r.role_state = 1
